author: Javier de Antonio
title: Patronal y sindicatos pactan subidas salariales por encima del IPC al margen del Gobierno
text:
Empleo
Patronal y sindicatos pactan subidas salariales por encima del IPC al margen del Gobierno
El aumento salarial pactado en convenio aumenta al 3,46% en julio, por encima del la inflaci√≥n del 2,7%. Tres millones de empleados no tiene cl√°usula de revisi√≥n salarial
La subida salarial pactada en los convenios colectivos con efectos econ√≥micos en 2025 aument√≥ hasta el 3,46% en julio, siete cent√©simas m√°s que en junio y por encima de la inflaci√≥n, que seg√∫n el INE se situ√≥ en el 2,7% en julio. Este incremento, que afecta a 925.963 empresas y 8,6 millones de trabajadores, es superior a la del mismo mes de 2024 (2,99%) y mantiene el aumento de la retribuci√≥n pactada en convenio por encima del 3%, tal y como recomienda el V Acuerdo para el Empleo y la Negociaci√≥n Colectiva (AENC). Por tanto, patronal y sindicatos demuestran que son capaces de llegar a acuerdos sin la intervenci√≥n del Gobierno, que es lo que reclaman los empresarios desde que el intervencionismo desde el Ministerio de Trabajo enturbia esta relaci√≥n.
Este AENC, firmado por patronal y sindicatos para el trienio 2023-2025, recog√≠a subidas salariales del 4% para 2023 y del 3% para 2024 y 2025, aunque inclu√≠a un alza adicional de hasta un 1% cada a√±o si el incremento de sueldos quedaba por debajo del alza de los precios, que hasta ahora no se ha producido.
Los datos muestran que el aumento salarial fue inferior en los convenios de empresa (2,81%) que en los de √°mbito superior a la empresa (3,5%), y que la retribuci√≥n en los convenios firmados este a√±o escala al 4,29 %, de nuevo con grandes diferencias entre los convenios de empresa (2,9%) y los de √°mbito superior a la empresa (4,33 %). estos datos, aportados por Trabajo, se√±alan que los sectores con un mayor incremento salarial fueron las actividades profesionales (4,95%) y sanitarias (4,83%), los servicios (3,72%), la construcci√≥n (3,14%), la industria (2,87%) y la agricultura (2,04%).
La subida salarial media pactada en los convenios conocidos y registrados con efectos econ√≥micos en 2023 fue del 3,61%, a√±o que cerr√≥ con una inflaci√≥n anual del 3,1%, mientras que la subida salarial media de 2024 fue del 3,32% y la inflaci√≥n se situ√≥ en el 2,8%. De cara a la pr√≥xima finalizaci√≥n de la vigencia del acuerdo, aunque los sindicatos abogan por sentarse a negociar a la vuelta del verano, las normativas pendientes de aprobaci√≥n, especialmente la reforma laboral, podr√≠an dilatar el proceso para que este pacto bipartito est√© aprobado a tiempo.
De los 2.753 convenios colectivos registrados en julio, solo 630 inclu√≠an una cl√°usula de garant√≠a salarial, que permite que el sueldo sea revisado al alza cada a√±o en funci√≥n del √≠ndice de precios de consumo (IPC) para proteger su poder adquisitivo. Esto implica que de los 8,6 millones de trabajadores amparados por convenio con efectos econ√≥micos conocidos y registrados solo 3 millones contaban con este mecanismo de revisi√≥n salarial.

author: Valerie Leung
title: Two new child-care centres at Richmond schools expected by fall 2025
text: Two new child-care facilities at Richmond schools are expected to be finished by fall of next year. Richmond Board of Education's Facilities meeting on Dec. 4 reviewed current and upcoming capital projects including the new child-care facilities. Spul'u'kwuks and Garden City elementary schools are expected to have child-care spaces - accommodating around 50 children in each - for daycare and before and after school programs. Each child-care centre will cost $1.98 million to build. Building permit applications for both were submitted in August and the facilities are expected to be completed by September 2025 within budget, according to a school district facilities and building committee agenda . Diefenbaker elementary also recently received provincial funding of more than $50 million for seismic upgrades, which includes a new neighbourhood learning centre with services such as child care. In August, $8.2 million in grants was approved by the provincial and federal governments to open 220 new licensed child-care spaces across the city and on school grounds. This includes eight spaces for infants and toddlers, 100 spaces for children 30 months to kindergarten age and 112 spaces for school-age care across the city. Richmond School District now has seven purpose-built child-care facilities. These are at Tomsett, Maple Lane, Manoah Steves, Whiteside, McKinney and William Bridge elementary schools and at the Mitchell Adult Education Centre. Got an opinion on this story or any others in Richmond? Send us a letter or email your thoughts or story tips to [[email protected]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#a6e3c2cfd2c9d4e6f4cfc5cecbc9c8c28be8c3d1d588c5c9cb). To stay updated on Richmond news, sign up for our daily headline newsletter . Words missing in article? Your adblocker might be preventing hyperlinked text from appearing.

More information can be found in our Cookies and Privacy Policy. You can amend your cookie settings to reject non-essential cookies by clicking Cookie Settings below. Accept All Cookies Manage Consent Preferences These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work or you may not be able to login. These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly. These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They are also used to limit the number of times you see an advert as well as help measure the effectiveness of an advertising campaign. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising. These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we may not know when you have visited our site, and may not be able to monitor its performance.

author: Anne Flaherty and Luis Martinez
title: Pentagon defends delay in US retaliatory strikes for drone attack
text: Pentagon defends delay in US retaliatory strikes for drone attack The drone militants fired at a U.S. base was Iranian-made, a U.S. official said. Warning that the Middle East is facing a "dangerous moment" in time, Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin on Thursday defended America's seeming delay in [responding to Sunday's enemy drone attack](https://abcnews.go.com/Politics/us-officially-blames-iran-backed-group-drone-strike/story?id=106834435) that killed three American service members four days ago. The remains of three Army reservists killed in the base attack were expected to arrive stateside on Friday, with Austin joining President [Joe Biden](https://abcnews.go.com/alerts/joe-biden) and the families at Dover Air Force Base in Delaware. In a press briefing, Austin said the U.S. is preparing a "multi-tiered response" to the attack that also minimizes collateral damage. The goal, he said, would be to degrade the capabilities of Iran-backed militants without plunging the region into a broader war. "There are ways to manage this so it doesn't spiral out of control. And that's been our focus throughout," he said. The Pentagon has declined to discuss operational details of the pending strikes, citing security concerns. A U.S. official familiar with the plan, but speaking on condition of anonymity, said the strikes will unfold across several days and hit multiple countries including Iraq and Syria and possibly Yemen. Since the start of the Israeli-Gaza war, the U.S. has found itself under near-constant attack from Iran-backed militants targeting commercial ships along the Red Sea and U.S. bases in Iraq and Syria. The tit-for-tat attacks have dragged on since fall, and U.S. officials say Iran is supplying the groups targeting U.S. assets. On Wednesday, U.S. Central Command said it stuck down a ground-based drone control station and 10 one-way attack drones in Yemen. Hours later, on Thursday, Houthi rebels launched two missiles but missed a nearby cargo ship, according to Central Command. The U.S. also reported striking down a drone and an explosive uncrewed surface vehicle. According to a U.S. official, the drone that successfully hit a U.S. base in Jordan last weekend was an Iranian-made Shahed drone, similar to those used by the Russians on the battlefield in Ukraine. Reuters first reported that the drone that killed the Americans was Iranian made. Austin confirmed that most of the drones used in the region come from Iran. When asked why the U.S. is pursuing a multi-tiered response, Austin said U.S. adversaries don't have a "one-and-done mindset." He noted, "they have a lot of capability." He added: "I have a lot more."

author: Mark Frankhouse
title: Recent Education Report Raises Alarms For Michigan Families - NewsBreak
text:
Michigan
Recent Education Report Raises Alarms For Michigan Families
By Mark Frankhouse,
47 minutes agoMichigan seems to be struggling with education, especially among children, and has recently been named one of the worst states for education. This comes from the Annie E. Casey Foundation‚Äôs annual Kids Count Data Book, which normally wouldn't be alarming, except that they've been doing these for a long time.

author: Domenico Mungiguerra
title: Grande Fratello, tensione nella notte: Lorenzo fuori controllo e lancia una sedia (Video)
text:
Tensione nella notte all'interno della casa del Grande Fratello , dove Lorenzo Spolverato ha avuto l'ennesimo crollo che l'ha portato a perdere il controllo.
Il modello milanese nel corso della serata √® stato protagonista di un nuovo acceso dibattito con Helena, che in settimana l'ha accusato di essere uno stratega che vorrebbe metterla in difficolt√† per portarla ad avere delle reazioni esagerate.
Un confronto che non √® piaciuto affatto a Lorenzo , al punto che ieri notte ha scaraventato una sedia per aria in giardino, furioso e amareggiato dal modo in cui sarebbe stato gestito questo dibattito nel corso della diretta, finendo per spaventare gli altri inquilini.
Tensione nella notte al Grande Fratello: Lorenzo fuori controllo e lancia una sedia in giardino Il clima all'interno della casa del GF continua a essere particolarmente teso e nel corso della notte di ieri Lorenzo si √® mostrato ancora una volta fuori controllo, lanciando una sedia per aria in giardino.
Un gesto che ha spaventato gli altri concorrenti presenti in casa, tra cui Stefania Orlando che preoccupata ha subito chiesto cosa fosse successo.
"Lore ha lanciato una sedia", √® stata la risposta di Pamela Petrarolo mentre Mariavittoria ha spiegato che il gesto del modello era dovuto alla situazione che si √® creata con Helena nel corso della puntata serale condotta d Alfonso Signorini su Canale 5.
Lorenzo spaventa i compagni del GF (Video) "Riferito alla situazione di Helena, Jessica mi ha appena detto che √® per il fatto che lui ha realizzato che tutto gira intorno ad Helena", ha svelato Mariavittoria.
Subito dopo il lancio della sedia, Lorenzo ha avuto modo di sfogarsi in giardino con la sua fidanzata Shaila, spiegando di essere stufo di questa situazione che si √® creata con la modella brasiliana.
Lorenzo lancia una sedia perch√© Helena √® protagonista della serata üôàüò∂üò≥
Voglio vedere come viene giustificato dalle sue fan #GrandeFratello #heleners pic.twitter.com/yHUAILAw9U
‚Äî Ani‚ô•Ô∏è (@Ana198309) January 30, 2025
"La sfida deve essere in qualche modo equivalente e qui non √® pi√π equilibrata", ha sentenziato il modello analizzando quanto sta accadendo all'interno della casa pi√π spiata d'Italia.
"Mi sento schiacciato e sono molto stanco", ha proseguito ancora Lorenzo ammettendo per√≤ di voler comunque portare avanti questo percorso iniziato lo scorso settembre.
I fan social contro il gesto di Lorenzo al GF Immediata la reazione dei fan che, dopo aver appreso dell'ennesimo gesto fuori controllo di Lorenzo, si aspettano provvedimenti da parte del GF.
"Anche questa volta verr√† tutelato come hanno sempre fatto fino a questo momento?", scrive un utente sui social.
"Il GF questa volta deve intervenire, non pu√≤ sempre sorvolare su Lorenzo", sentenzia un altro spettatore.
"Poverino non √® al centro dell'attenzione questa sera", scrive ironicamente qualcun altro.

author: enrique.villanueva@razon.com.mx (Enrique Villanueva)
title: F1: Pilotos eligen al top 10 de conductores de la temporada y menosprecian a Checo P√©rez
text: Fuera de pistas F1: Pilotos eligen al top 10 de conductores de la temporada y menosprecian a Checo P√©rez Los pilotos de F1 eligieron a los 10 mejores conductores del a√±o y el mexicano Checo P√©rez qued√≥ ubicado hasta el d√©cimo lugar [Parece que el subcampeonato que obtuvo este a√±o el tapat√≠o Sergio Checo P√©rez en la F√≥rmula 1 (F1)](https://www.razon.com.mx/deportes/f1-checo-perez-vive-increible-momento-recibir-trofeo-subcampeon-formula-1-gala-fia-2023-556446) no es un gran logro para el resto de los pilotos del Gran Circo, pues entre todos eligieron a los 10 mejores conductores del a√±o, dejando al mexicano hasta el d√©cimo puesto. El neerland√©s Max Verstappen, quien gan√≥ su tercer t√≠tulo consecutivo, fue elegido como el mejor volante de la campa√±a en la que gan√≥ 19 de 22 carreras. El segundo lugar en este ranking lo ocupa el brit√°nico Lewis Hamilton, quien fue el √∫nico que no particip√≥ en esta votaci√≥n. El piloto de Mercedes acab√≥ tercero en el campeonato con 234 unidades, 41 menos que las que cosech√≥ Checo P√©rez. En el tercer pelda√±o qued√≥ el espa√±ol Fernando Alonso, quien en su primer a√±o con Aston Martin culmin√≥ en la cuarta posici√≥n. El top 5 en este listado hecho por los conductores de [F1 se ubicaron el brit√°nico Lando Norris y el monegasco Charles Leclerc](https://www.razon.com.mx/deportes/f1-gp-vegas-lando-norris-abandona-carrera-fuerte-choque-muro-video-553811), quienes finalizaron la campa√±a como quinto y s√©ptimo, de manera respectiva. El espa√±ol Carlos Sainz fue elegido como el sexto mejor piloto de F1, seguido por el tailand√©s Alexander Albon, el australiano Oscar Piastri, el franc√©s Pierre Gasly y Checo P√©rez. Oscar Piastri y Pierre Gasly fueron los volantes de nuevo ingreso en este ranking en comparaci√≥n con el del a√±o pasado. El australiano acab√≥ el campeonato en el noveno pelda√±o, mientras que el franc√©s termin√≥ en el decimoprimer sitio. Checo P√©rez recibe advertencia de Christian Horner [A pesar de que este a√±o el piloto mexicano Sergio P√©rez](https://www.razon.com.mx/deportes/f1-checo-perez-recibe-advertencia-christian-horner-darnos-lujo-pierda-558469), termin√≥ como subcampe√≥n de la F√≥rmula 1 (F1), Christian Horner, jefe de la escuder√≠a Red Bull, apunt√≥ a las fallas de Checo en las sesiones de clasificaci√≥n, por lo que considero que es clave que el tapat√≠o mejore en ese rubro en la pr√≥xima campa√±a. "Su mayor resoluci√≥n ser√≠a solucionar su clasificaci√≥n. Ese ha sido su tal√≥n de aquiles en determinados momentos del a√±o. Si puede hacer eso, su ritmo de carrera siempre ser√° fuerte, correr√° muy bien", declar√≥ Horner en entrevista con Sky Sports. [Christian Horner fue cr√≠tico al se√±alar que en Red Bull ](https://www.razon.com.mx/deportes/f1-checo-perez-tendria-sorprendente-oferta-dejar-red-bull-cambiar-escuderia-557168)no pueden darse el lujo de dejar pasar por alto la inconsistencia del volante jalisciense. Sin embargo, tambi√©n resalt√≥ que P√©rez Mendoza va por buen camino. "No podemos darnos el lujo de que se pierda en ciertos puntos del campeonato y tenga esa inconsistencia. Termino segundo este a√±o, tercero el a√±o pasado, cuartos el anterior, as√≠ que est√° en la trayectoria correcta", concluy√≥ Christian Horner.
